string.value: According to the Memorykeeper, you must return the the point where you started your adventure in order to regain your lost memory. Hmm... Wouldn't that be the time you left the farm and went to Chief Stan on an errand? Go to #bHenesys#k and meet with #bChief Stan#k.

You met with Chief Stan. Chief Stan, who only knew you to be the second child of the Gustav, was very happy that you became a Maple World Hero. Talking to Chief Stan, who still remembers your childhood, warms your heart.

You met with Chief Stan. Chief Stan, who only knew you to be the second child of the Gustav, was very happy that you became a Maple World Hero. Talking to Chief Stan, who still remembers your childhood, warms your heart.
